actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 102-228.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to generate accurate data necessary for continued maintenance of food safety and public health standards and to protect employees who report food safety violations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Poultry Consumer Protection Act of 1991 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to mandate a study and an annual report to specified congressional committees on the incidence of human infection from microbiological pathogenic contamination of the U.S. food supply with the salmonella group of bacteria and campylobacter jejuni. Authorizes appropriations. Prohibits retaliation against any employee who assists in the study.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to generate accurate data necessary for continued maintenance of food safety and public health standards and to protect employees who report food safety violations, and for other purposes.
